name: Must Protect
description:
The world is ending and the Zombie Apocalypse has taken over! You are the only one who can fight them and help the human race to reach safety.

Use simple swipe controls to transport a little girl to safety as you trash through zombie hoards and road obstructions, MUST PROTECT!



Features:
- Single tap and drag to play
- No Ads
- Free to Play
- Challenge your friends
